amendment.description: To amend section 212 of the Immigration and Nationality Act regarding restrictions on the admission of aliens.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4117 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 139.

Amendment SA 4117 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S4938-4941, S4942-4943, S4951-4952; text: CR S4939) To amend section 212 of the Immigration and Nationality Act regarding restrictions on the admission of aliens.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4117 proposed by Senator Leahy.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4117 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 139.
